summary: This Preset is intended for CBBEv3 users since that's the body type that I use. But its Bodyslide, use it to your leisure.
descriptionHtml:
There's not much to it. It's a preset that I used for the CBBEv3 curvy body type that I pretty much only use. But I haven't given much thought to wither it would work for other body types, but it is for bodyslide so if it does it does and if it doesn't....well oh well. There is only a small use of the BreastSH or BreastSSH so it shouldn't be immersion breaking or so I figure. So for the most part any armor that uses bodyslide should be fine with the use of this preset but don't hold me too it, I could be wrong...a little hopefully.

Oh and also, it will look great for those that like to use TBBP or HDT physics.

No other mods were used to create my preset, But other mods were used to show it off. So for safety sake.
Credit for the modders which mod or mods I used to show off my preset:
